replies.body: Enemy Tahm eats an ally champ, then Ally Tahm eats Enemy Tahm... that is legit.

you forgot where syndra picks up gromp, kalista ults Syndra while holding gromp, tahm eats kalista, and then thresh lanterns them all into the fight

No, no. Kalista draws in her support, Tahm eats ally Kalista, enemy Tahm eats other Tahm, enemy Kalista draws in other Tahm. This is know as the, "All in One." https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VRl2Jn0jfyg
One for All mirror mode Tahm Kench. Every champion in that game inside one Tahm's belly
Talk about explosive vomit toward the end there...
See the return of All for One mode and see dreams get realized tenfold

So nerfed he shall be,
And destined to sit on the bench.

Tahm for you to do your research

Hey, how many people think that Tahm Kench could be played jungle? Imo, I feel with his kit, he has potential to become one hell-of-a jungler; he has an ultimate similar to twisted fate's, he has epic sustain with his e passive and active, he has a slow/stun with his q, and he can save allies with his w and has great ganking potential with his w since he can take up his allies and quickly close the target in, and or swallow his target if close enough and lodge him into your team/turret.
One thing that might work against him in the jungle is his need to apply 3 passive stacks before he can really do a lot of work, and long sustained ganks might not work so well imo.
I've been planning to jungle as him since he was announced.
Started from the botahm now we're here.
